website_summaries.verdict: A fun, brightly colored controller that is compatible with many features on the Nintendo Switch.
pros: Features a turbo continuous shooting option that is great to use with arcade and action games
Fully charges in 2 hours and provides up to 7 hours of game time
Also compatible with Android and PC
Connects to the Switch easily with Bluetooth
cons: Only charges when plugged into the Switch, not into a wall outlet

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Bought three of these with Smash Bros Ultimate for the kids. They've been put through the paces now since the kids are tearing the game up. Since I read the reviews first about only charging on a PC or the Switch I've had no problems with battery life. Button response feels solid with no lag. The hardest part was syncing up the controller with the switch just due to the switch menus. Once we figured that out it was off to the races. Would recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: PW

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it's made for at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly accurate and reliable. It has a decent weight to it. Not as heavy as the Pro controller but somewhat heavier than a PS4 controller. It's accurate, easy to pair and has a decent battery life. Buttons feel good, not too stiff or soft. Same with the sticks. I do like the LEDs on the buttons. It lights them up. It has motion control too so it's compatible with practically every game. It's certainly worth it to me.
customer_reviews.author: w1r374p

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these for my daughter's Switch for Christmas. They worked ok for about 2 days. Now one has a right joystick that needs to be calibrated constantly. The other one, the RT button broke. Took it apart to see if I could fix it, and one of the clasps that holds the button was snapped. Neither we're dropped, just normal game play, and both have the latest firmware. Just save up your money and get the Nintendo Pro. Money wasted here.
customer_reviews.author: rhamej

customer_reviews.title: Works Well With Android, HOWEVER...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this controller to use with my T95Q Android TV Box since, according to Amazon, it will work with it. Congrats, it does. However, I was also hoping to use the Hycarus's dual shock and six axis tilt options. That's when I found out, through thorough searching, that there are no gamepad Android games that support vibration/dual shock/force feed feedback or six axis tilt/accelerometer/gyroscope. That's why I deducted 2 points in my rating. I'm guessing that I may have prematurely bought this gamepad and should wait for another six months or a year till the Powers That Be at Android Games Central modify their TV games to support gamepads which come with gyroscopes and haptic motors.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great Controller
customer_reviews.text: Controller is very comfortable, buttons are great and so are joysticks. The only issue that i have is that the RT button is too sensitive and just touching it will trigger it. The instructions are clear and setup is easy. There is only one motor for the rumble and it's on the right, so you will feel the imbalance of vibration while playing. The turbo button is not really what I expected though, it goes at about .422 button presses per second and that makes the turbo button somewhat useless since about anyone can press a button faster than that unlike one of my other controllers has a turbo button that goes at .119.
customer_reviews.author: David Porter

customer_reviews.title: Works great for what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I needed a wireless controller with lighted buttons and this fit the bill. Works great for me. I have had many hours of Zelda playing without a hitch. It is a shame that third party controllers cannot start up the switch, but if I am lazy, I can grab an original controller to start it up and then switch to this one easily. I recharge about every other play session, whether neeeded or not and this is working out fine, I don't run out of charge. Great job. Need a steering wheel and stuff now. :-)

customer_reviews.title: Works well but not for everyone, not very durable
customer_reviews.text: The controller is nice to use it sync easily with the switch, works well but durability is a big question mark my son dropped it and the back button broke. I contacted the seller who offered no advise in fixing it but could only offer me a 10% my next purchase so support for this product is not there in terms of fixing. My advice if you're buying for older kids and adults this my work for you but if you have younger children you might have to find a more durable product.

customer_reviews.title: Compatible with android, PC and Nintendo Switch
customer_reviews.text: The controller can switch from one synced device to another without issues. I could connect it to android devices through both wired and bluetooth connections. Same for PC and tested it for wireless connection with Nintendo Switch succesfully. Movement controlls respond well too. The controller feel right when gripped and the material seems resistant enouh. The attached cable meets specifications and the manual is clear and the instructions were helpful.. Support was swift and effective regarding updating the firmware.
customer_reviews.author: Leorobin

customer_reviews.title: Unique controller -Requires firmware update
customer_reviews.text: This is a very neat controller. Looking at it it's clear this is modeled off of a PlayStation controller. The buttons have built in LED lights and light up in use which is a nice addition. Games are also pretty responsive. If you're familiar with PlayStation it will help with the learning curve of using this controller. The biggest drawback I found with this was that you need to download a firmware update to get it to pair with the system, which absolutely must be done before playing. I find this slightly inconvenient but Hycarus works with you and assists with the firmware update if need be.

Love playing Paladins and Fortnite with this controller. The best part is that it's a fraction of the price compared to the Nintendo Switch Controller. Its a STEAL!!! I will recommend this product to my friends and family, also will be buying a second one as well
